    The type of this flag will change from a StringFlag to a ComponentFlag to support JSON text in a future release. If you depend on the type of this flag, take proper precaution for future breakage.

  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.sk89q.worldguard.domains.Domain.contains(String)
    names are deprecated in MC 1.7+ in favor of UUIDs
    com.sk89q.worldguard.domains.PlayerDomain.addPlayer(String)
    names are deprecated in favor of UUIDs in MC 1.7+
    com.sk89q.worldguard.domains.PlayerDomain.getPlayers()
    names are deprecated in favor of UUIDs in MC 1.7+
    com.sk89q.worldguard.domains.PlayerDomain.removePlayer(String)
    names are deprecated in favor of UUIDs in MC 1.7+
    com.sk89q.worldguard.internal.permission.RegionPermissionModel.mayIgnoreRegionProtection(World)
    Check WorldGuard.getInstance().getPlatform().getSessionManager().hasBypass(..) instead
    com.sk89q.worldguard.internal.platform.WorldGuardPlatform.stackPlayerInventory(LocalPlayer)
    com.sk89q.worldguard.protection.managers.RegionManager.matchRegion(String)
    Use exact ids with RegionManager.getRegion(java.lang.String)
    com.sk89q.worldguard.protection.regions.ProtectedCuboidRegion.setMaximumPoint(BlockVector3)
    ProtectedRegion bounds should never be mutated. Regions must be redefined to move them. This method will be removed in a future release.
    com.sk89q.worldguard.protection.regions.ProtectedCuboidRegion.setMinimumPoint(BlockVector3)
    ProtectedRegion bounds should never be mutated. Regions must be redefined to move them. This method will be removed in a future release.
    com.sk89q.worldguard.protection.regions.ProtectedRegion.isMember(String)
    Names are deprecated, this will not return players added by UUID (LocalPlayer)
    com.sk89q.worldguard.protection.regions.ProtectedRegion.isOwner(String)
    Names are deprecated, this will not return owners added by UUID (LocalPlayer)
    com.sk89q.worldguard.protection.util.DomainInputResolver.createAddAllFunction(DefaultDomain)
    was only used for Future transformation. Can be replaced with region.getOwners()::addAll (or getMembers).
    com.sk89q.worldguard.protection.util.DomainInputResolver.createRemoveAllFunction(DefaultDomain)
    was only used for Future transformation. Can be replaced with region.getOwners()::removeAll (or getMembers).
    com.sk89q.worldguard.session.SessionManager.createSession(LocalPlayer)
    Use SessionManager.get(com.sk89q.worldguard.LocalPlayer) instead
